channel.title: Need help on fixing the Sources Ip so people can connect to my source
channel.description:
Ok my one big problem is, just getting my new source online so people may connect to my No-ip. where do i go to make it so people can connect to my Ip on my new Server (source). Thanks.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2008, 11:29:42 pm[/size][hr]Er.. i tried to connect with my client, which is already set up to connect to my no-ip and has worked on my other source, when i go to connect to my server says " error connecting to the server".. Er, this is why i was curious if i have to change anything in the source to connect to my no-ip, like i had to do with my client.
